questions.question: What is the order of the moon, sun and earth for a lunar eclipse ¿Cuál es el orden de la luna, el sol y la tierra para

choices.answer: Sun, Earth Moon/ Sol, Tierra Luna
Moon, Sun earth/ Luna, sol tierra
Earth, Sun, Moon
all of the above/ Todas las anteriores

questions.question: Complete the sentence: In a solar eclipse_______ gets darker as moon blocks the suns light.

choices.answer: The Sun
The Moon
The earth
All of the above

questions.question: In a lunar eclipse, ________ Gets darker as the earth blocks the suns light.

choices.answer: Earth
The moon
The sun
none of the above

questions.question: Can a solar eclipse be observed at the same time everywhere on earth?

choices.answer: no, because earth and moon rotate at the same speed
yes because earth and the moon are the same distance to the sun
yes, because areas all over earth receive the same amount of solar energy
no because 1 side of earth is always complete darkness due to its rotation

questions.question: Why do eclipses not occur each month? ¿Por qué los eclipses no ocurren todos los meses?

choices.answer: they are not always fast enough to block the sun light
moon & the earths positions are not always aligned to block the sunlight
Earth and the moon are not always beside each other
earth and the moon are not always shining the same amount of light

questions.question: What must occur for a solar and lunar eclipse to occur? ¿Qué debe ocurrir para que ocurra un eclipse solar y lunar?

choices.answer: all three objects must line plos tres objetos deben alinear p perfectamente
They have to be the same size/ Ellos tienen que ser del mismo tamaño /

questions.question: Why does a total solar eclipse only last for 3 minutes?/ ¿Por qué un eclipse solar total solo dura 3 minutos?

choices.answer: because the sun is moving away / emocionante, motor, movedizo
because the moon in continuously moving /  porque la luna en continuo movimiento
because the birds will stop chirping. porque los pájaros dejarán de piar.

questions.question: Why can we not see a new moon?/ ¿Por qué no podemos ver una luna nueva?

choices.answer: the moon is too bright to be able to see anything through it
moon is directly in front of th sun so it cannot reflect any light on earth
the sun shines more than the moon so we cannot see the moon

questions.question: The Phases of the Moon/ Las fases de la luna

choices.answer: Can Occur in any order/ Puede ocurrir en cualquier orden
Change every 12 years/ Cambiar cada 12 años
Follow a pattern with a predictable sequence Sigue un patrón con una secuen

questions.question: True or false: The moon follows a pattern./Verdadero o falso: la luna sigue un patrón.

choices.answer: True/ Cierto
False/ Falso

questions.question: About how often does the pattern of moon phases repeat?

choices.answer: every 28 days/ cada 28 dias
every 14 days/ cada 14 dias
every day/ todos los días
